snippet.title: Farmers Allowed To Withdraw Upto Rs 25,000 Per Week

localized.description:
Families can withdraw Rs 2.5 lakh for weddings from one account and farmers can withdraw up to Rs 25,000 a week, the government said today, announcing another set of measures to ease a massive cash crunch after the currency ban.

Watch more videos: http://www.ndtv.com/video?yt
Download the NDTV news app: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.july.ndtv&referrer=utm_source%3Dyoutubecards%26utm_medium%3Dcpc%26utm_campaign%3Dyoutube
